title: Washington Post reporter held in Iran angry, depressed, brother says
text:
Washington Post reporter held in Iran angry, depressed, brother says 
Published By: Reuters - Today 
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post reporter jailed in an espionage case in Tehran, heard of his conviction on Iranian...
